snippet: After a diagnosis of macular degeneration, Mr. Prigent reinvented himself as a dealer in antiques and was a connoisseur of the French Empire style.
abstract: Roger Prigent, who gave up promising career in fashion photography when his eyesight began to fail and became prominent Manhattan antiques dealer, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: After a diagnosis of macular degeneration, Mr. Prigent reinvented himself as a dealer in antiques and was a connoisseur of the French Empire style.

headline.seo: Roger Prigent, Photographer Turned Antiques Dealer, Dies at 89
headline.main: Roger Prigent, 89, Photographer and Antiquarian, Dies
headline.print_headline: Roger Prigent, 89, Photographer and Antiquarian, Dies
